definition: Never giving up, even when things get tough
example: Tom Brady showed incredible perseverance when he came back from 28-3 in the Super Bowl.

definition: Holding on tight and never letting go of your goals
example: Like Spider-Man's grip, Steph Curry is tenacious when he keeps shooting even after missing.

definition: Bouncing back quickly after something bad happens
example: The Eagles were resilient after losing their quarterback - they kept fighting and won anyway.

definition: Doing the right thing even when nobody's watching
example: Captain America shows integrity by always telling the truth and keeping his promises.

definition: Starting something without being asked or told
example: Patrick Mahomes took initiative by creating new plays when the coach's plan wasn't working.

definition: Taking responsibility for your actions and mistakes
example: LeBron James shows accountability when he says 'That loss was on me' after a bad game.

definition: Making quick, confident decisions without hesitating
example: A quarterback must be decisive - throw the ball or run, but don't stand there thinking!

definition: Working together as a team to reach a goal
example: The Avengers collaborate to defeat Thanos - they're stronger together than alone.

definition: Speaking clearly so everyone understands exactly what you mean
example: Peyton Manning was articulate when calling plays - every player knew exactly what to do.

definition: Having a smart plan to win or succeed
example: Bill Belichick is strategic - he studies opponents for weeks to find their weaknesses.

definition: Understanding how someone else feels
example: Spider-Man shows empathy by helping the villain when he realizes he's just scared and hurt.

definition: Doing what you need to do, even when you don't feel like it
example: Kobe Bryant had discipline - practicing at 4 AM every day, even on holidays.

definition: Not bragging about yourself, even when you're awesome
example: Giannis stays humble - he thanks his teammates after winning MVP instead of boasting.

definition: Being brave and doing scary things when it's important
example: Jackie Robinson was courageous when he became the first Black player in Major League Baseball.

definition: Working out a deal where everyone gets something they want
example: Iron Man negotiated with Nick Fury - he'd join the Avengers if he could keep his suits.

definition: Staying calm and in control when things get crazy
example: Joe Burrow keeps his composure in the pocket even with 300-pound defenders charging at him.

definition: Having big dreams and working hard to reach them
example: Michael Jordan was ambitious - he wanted to be the greatest player ever, not just good.

definition: Paying attention to every tiny detail to make something perfect
example: Batman is meticulous when planning - he thinks of everything that could go wrong.

definition: Changing your plan quickly when things don't go as expected
example: Lamar Jackson is adaptable - if passing doesn't work, he switches to running.

definition: Believing good things will happen and looking on the bright side
example: Ted Lasso stays optimistic even when his team loses - 'We'll get them next time!'

definition: Standing up for what's right, even when powerful people disagree
example: Luke Skywalker was defiant when he refused to join the Dark Side, even facing the Emperor.

definition: Thinking about how your actions affect other people
example: Aaron Judge is considerate - he signs autographs for kids even when he's tired.

definition: Coming up with new, creative ways to solve problems
example: Stephen Curry was innovative when he started shooting three-pointers from the logo.

definition: Never stopping or slowing down until you succeed
example: The Terminator is relentless - he keeps coming no matter what you throw at him.

definition: Being good at many different things, not just one
example: LeBron James is versatile - he can play any position and do it all: score, pass, defend.

definition: Working carefully and steadily without giving up
example: Jerry Rice was diligent - running the same routes 1000 times until they were perfect.

definition: Being your true self instead of pretending to be someone else
example: Kevin Hart is authentic - he makes jokes about his real life instead of faking being cool.

definition: Showing great bravery, especially in a tough fight
example: Thor made a valiant effort against Thanos, fighting even when he was outnumbered.

definition: Making smart, careful decisions by thinking ahead
example: Andy Reid is prudent with timeouts - he saves them for when the team really needs them.

definition: The quality of never giving up, like a bulldog with a bone
example: Russell Wilson shows tenacity by escaping five tackles and still throwing a touchdown.
